Installation
===========

Prerequisites
------------

Before installing Code Quality Analyzer, ensure you have:

* Python 3.7 or higher
* pip package manager

Installation Methods
------------------



From Source
^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code-block:: bash

   Download the repository
   cd  "the_repository"
   pip install -e .

Development Installation
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

For development, install with additional dependencies:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install -e ".[dev]"
